virtual IAkVoicePluginInfo* AK::IAkEffectPluginContext::GetVoiceInfo (  )  [pure virtual]

Obtain the interface to access the voice in which the plugin is inserted.

Returns:
The interface to voice info. NULL if the plugin is instantiated on a bus.
